response.original_title: Disney's Living Characters: A Broken Promise
response.overview: In this over 4-hour journey, Kevin follows the promise of Disney's Living Character Initiative, a dedicated effort to populate Disney's theme parks with free-roaming, interactive, mechanical beings. It was touted as the future of theme parks, so how'd it go?
response.tagline: So you made a robot stand up and talk... now what?
response.title: Disney's Living Characters: A Broken Promise
